title: Vince Apostal from Loud & Obnoxious/Glad Rags Ink - Episode 63
itunes:title: Vince Apostal from Loud & Obnoxious/Glad Rags Ink - Episode 63
description:
This was a long delayed episode (as I was dumb and made our first conversation unlistenable) but I had the opportunity to stop by the Loud & Obnoxious/Glad Rags HQ for a chat with the owner, Vince Apostal. We discussed hustle, hockey and the importance of family. Brought to you in conjunction with Propertyofzack.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
